allow: Bash(for file in Command/Command.tsx ConfirmationModal/ConfirmationModal.tsx Console/Console.tsx CpuCard/CpuCard.tsx data-table/DataTable.tsx DragDropGrid/DragDropGrid.tsx DropZone/DropZone.tsx form.tsx FormModal/FormModal.tsx InfoTooltip/InfoTooltip.tsx Sidebar/Sidebar.tsx Sonner/Sonner.tsx UsageCard/UsageCard.tsx)
Bash(cmd.exe /c "for /f ""tokens=5"" %a in \(''netstat -aon ^| findstr :1420 ^| findstr LISTENING''\) do taskkill /F /PID %a")
Bash(cmd /c "taskkill /f /im stellar-desktop.exe 2>nul & taskkill /f /im node.exe 2>nul & echo Done")
